turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Hi there! Thanks for contacting Green Valley Medical Clinic.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Are you calling to make a new appointment, or to change or cancel an existing one?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hi, good morning. I'd like to make an appointment this week.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Good morning! Absolutely, I’d be happy to help. May I know which day and time works best for you this week?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! Let me check our schedule for you. We have openings on Wednesday afternoon and Thursday morning. Does either of those times work for you?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great! I’ll book you in for Wednesday afternoon. Could you please let me know the preferred time, and also the reason for your visit?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, Alright, so we’ll set it for 1 p.m. on Wednesday. And could you also let me know the reason for your visit, just so we can prepare accordingly?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes, I've had a headache and I couldn't sleep well these days.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I’m sorry to hear that. We’ll make sure to note that down. I’ll go ahead and confirm your appointment for Wednesday at 1 p.m. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Is it okay if I come earlier 10 minutes?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, that’s absolutely fine! Feel free to arrive 10 minutes early, and we’ll get you checked in smoothly. Is there anything else you’d like to know?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: That will be all. Thanks. I'll see you at 1pm on Wednesday.
